summary: "The Wonderful Wizard of Oz" is a classic children's book written by L. Frank Baum in 1900. It tells the story of Dorothy, a Kansas farm girl, who gets swept away to the magical Land of Oz by a cyclone, along with her dog Toto. To return home, Dorothy must defeat the Wicked Witch of the West. The book was a huge success, leading Baum to write 13 more Oz books. It's now one of America's best-known fairytales, made famous by the 1939 movie "The Wizard of Oz."
title: The Wonderful Wizard of Oz
